title: How to write a review paper for a book - Quora

response.answer_text: It is quite an extensive job and a commitment and an undertaking that will test your critical skills to the utmost with inherent vulnerability if you are inexperienced and a novice in this field ! Min general, you should include :- The name of the authors and the book title and its main theme;Relevant details of the authors and where they stand in the genre or field of enquiry ;The context of the book ;The thesis of the book ;Your thesis about the book .
